banner.titels: Services for the installation of industrial air conditioning and ventilation systems.

services.p1: You have the opportunity to receive free information from our company’s specialists.
services.p3: Installation and maintenance of heating and cooling systems in buildings
services.p4: A professional team with 20 years of experience

projects.p1: We are proud to have installed advanced heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC) systems at the Central Asia Expo Center (CAEx) in Tashkent, Uzbekistan. Our solutions ensure optimal comfort for all events held at this modern exhibition center.
projects.p2: The installation of advanced VRF systems at Tashkent City Opera ensures perfect climate conditions for both the audience and performers. Our solutions guarantee comfort and efficiency at one of the city’s most important cultural venues.
projects.p3: ProHVAC installed advanced VRF systems in the ZAMIN HOTELS RAMADA project. This solution provides high energy efficiency and optimal climate control for guests.
projects.p4: Shivaki cassette-type VRF systems were installed by ProHVAC in the 'Presidential School in Tashkent' project.
projects.p5: Shivaki VRF systems were installed by ProHVAC in the 'Yurt in Karakalpakstan' project, which was recognized by the Guinness World Records.
projects.p6: Aux VRF systems were installed by ProHVAC in the 'Renaissance University' project. This solution ensures high energy efficiency and optimal climate conditions in the university’s academic and administrative buildings.

news.title1: Who is a Construction Project Manager?
news.desc1: Discover Invest has several construction project managers. This specialist is responsible for the successful implementation of the assigned construction project, managing the entire process from the planning stage and approval of project documentation to commissioning and sometimes even post-project support.
news.desc2: The complex interior design of the halls creates a comfortable atmosphere even before entering the apartment, and a convenient navigation system helps you easily reach the desired floor or area.
news.desc3: The transport infrastructure allows you to easily move to any part of the city: you just need to choose the necessary and desired route.
news.title4: We continue to introduce you to Discover Invest’s multi-functional properties.
news.desc4: We continue to introduce you to the multifunctional properties of the 'ATAEV BAHODIR BUILD' company. One of them is the 'Yangi Choshtepa Residential Complex,' built in the Yangikhayat district of Tashkent. The total construction area is 12 hectares. To date, 29 residential buildings have been constructed.

about.h2: PROHVAC Heating and Air Conditioning Installation Service
about.p: ProHVAC is a leading expert in the installation and maintenance of VRF, VRV, chiller systems, ventilation systems, and split air conditioners. We offer customized climate control solutions for residential, commercial, and industrial facilities, ensuring comfort, energy efficiency, and long-term operation. Using modern technologies and equipment from leading manufacturers, our qualified specialists provide high-quality installation and maintenance services. This allows precise temperature control, improved air quality, and reduced energy consumption. ProHVAC offers a full range of climate system design, installation, and maintenance services, guaranteeing maximum comfort and efficiency for every client.
